user_data.target_needs: I primarily sought comfort and fit in my underwear purchases, aiming for products that would provide all-day wearability without irritation or discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that I could wear all day without irritation. The product's description highlighted its softness and durability, which appealed to my need for comfort and longevity. However, my experience indicated that while it was good, it didn't exceed my expectations, suggesting that I was influenced by the promise of comfort but perhaps not fully satisfied with the outcome.

I wanted to find underwear that would fit my body shape well and provide comfort. The product was marketed as designed for curves, which was a significant factor in my decision. However, I was disappointed to find that it did not meet my expectations regarding the material, which led to my negative review. This indicates that I relied on the product's claims but was ultimately let down by the reality.

I needed reliable underwear that would be comfortable and not show under my clothes. The product's features, such as breathability and a no-show design, were key factors in my decision. My positive experience suggests that I made a well-informed choice based on the product's attributes and my needs.

I was searching for a comfortable and modest underwear option. The description mentioned a smooth fit and full coverage, which appealed to my desire for comfort. However, my experience did not align with the expectations set by the description, leading to my dissatisfaction with the fit and material.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, durable, and made from high-quality materials, particularly cotton. I value items that fit well and provide a good level of support, whether it's clothing or accessories. Features like adjustable waistbands, pockets, and breathable fabrics are important to me, as they enhance usability and comfort. I also appreciate vibrant colors and patterns that add a fun element to my purchases. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that do not meet my expectations in terms of material quality, fit, or comfort. I am particularly sensitive to items that are not true to their fabric description or that do not provide the promised comfort and durability. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and practicality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want recommendations for comfortable and well-fitting underwear that I can wear all day without any irritation or discomfort. within my expected price range: [8.46, 15.97]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Underwear Boxer Briefs Pack, Moisture-Wicking Men's Mesh Underwear, X-Temp Cooling with Odor Control, 3-Pack> / Item ID: B07JDRLQZ8 / Price: $15.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from a high-quality X-Temp™ 4-way stretch mesh fabric that's designed to adapt to your body temperature. So as your body sweats, the smart technology wicks away moisture and reduces odor to keep you feeling comfortable all day long. Our experts also designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that helps your men's underwear flex and move with you. And their no-ride-up design stays securely in place, so you don't have to keep adjusting throughout the day. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's boxer underwear sets are available in multiple size options that won't ride up, so you can choose the one that works best for you."]
